alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 10:26PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 1100 PM EST/1000 PM CST/... At 1025 PM EST/925 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Blountstown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Clarksville, Red Oak, Ocheesee, Selman, Chason, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Kennys Mill, Willis, Nettle Ridge, Blountstown Airport, Macedonia, Torreya State Park, Durham and Roy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
